title: Everything You Need to
subtitle: From single agent tasks to complex multi-agent research pipelines, Sciorex gives you total control over your AI workflows.

features.title: Multi-Provider AI
features.description: Use Claude, Gemini, Codex, or local models via LM Studio and Ollama. Switch providers per agent or chat session.

features.title: Custom AI Agents
features.description: Create specialized agents with unique prompts, system instructions, and tool permissions. Each agent has its own personality and expertise.

features.title: Visual Flow Editor
features.description: Design complex multi-agent pipelines with a node-based editor. Chain agents, add conditions, parallel execution, and data transformation.

features.title: Ticket & Kanban
features.description: Track work across agents with a powerful ticket system. Link conversations to tickets and see the full history of agent interactions.

features.title: Multi-Session Chat
features.description: Run multiple conversation threads, fork sessions from any message, and organize chats with color-coded labels.

features.title: MCP Tool Protocol
features.description: Configure different MCP servers per agent. Need Slack alerts? Database access? Custom APIs? Just add the right MCP.

features.title: IDE Integration
features.description: Open files in your VS Code compatible IDE via our bridge extension, use the integrated VS Code web, or the Monaco editor for quick edits.

features.title: Research Tracking
features.description: Track research workflows: paper fetching, summarization, hypothesis generation, experimentation, and verification.

features.title: Epic Organization
features.description: Group related tickets into epics for hierarchical organization. Perfect for tracking large research projects.

features.title: Full Audit Trail
features.description: Every action is logged with actor information (human or agent). Never lose track of what happened and when.

features.title: Event-Driven Flows
features.description: Trigger workflows from ticket events, cron schedules, or manual actions. Build reactive automation systems.

features.title: Extended Thinking
features.description: Configure thinking levels from quick responses to ultra-deep analysis with adjustable token budgets.

features.title: 100% Local & Private
features.description: All data stays on your machine. No data collection, no tracking. Your AI interactions remain private.

features.title: Smart Notifications
features.description: Desktop and sound notifications for agent completions, errors, and important events.
